item.title: 前中国人民银行官员称，如果特朗普提高关税，中国将采取报复行动

item.title: 由于欧盟森林砍伐计划的不确定性，ICE 推迟了变更计划

item.title: 安杜里尔主席与特朗普就美国军事改革进行磋商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普及其团队与国防技术初创公司 Anduril Industries Inc. 的执行主席特雷-斯蒂芬斯（Trae Stephens）进行了磋商，这凸显了即将上任的政府计划整顿美国军队。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump and his team consulted with Trae Stephens, executive chairman of defense technology startup Anduril Industries Inc., underscoring the incoming administration’s plans to shake up the US military, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 参议员呼吁调查马斯克与俄罗斯的 SpaceX 合同
item.description: 两名美国民主党参议员呼吁对埃隆-马斯克参与美国政府与其公司 SpaceX 之间的合同进行调查，理由是据报道他与弗拉基米尔-普京总统及其他俄罗斯官员的接触引发了国家安全问题。【原文：Two Democratic US senators called for an investigation into Elon Musk’s involvement in contracts between the US government and his company SpaceX, citing national security concerns raised by his reported contact with President Vladimir Putin and other Russian officials.】

item.title: 华尔街大选后的市场热情正在降温
item.description: 在经历了大选后的冒险狂欢后，本周股票投资者逐渐冷静下来，因为杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在降息问题上发出的 "缓慢 "信息冷却了推动华尔街创下历史记录的特朗普贸易兴奋情绪。【原文：After a post-election risk-taking binge, stock investors sobered up this week as Jerome Powell’s go-slow message on interest-rate cuts cooled the Trump trade euphoria that drove Wall Street to records.】

item.title: 特朗普以白宫职位奖励极度网络推手
item.description: 2024 年 7 月 16 日星期二，佛罗里达州共和党众议员马特-盖茨（Matt Gaetz）在美国威斯康星州密尔沃基市费瑟夫论坛举行的共和党全国代表大会（RNC）上。前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）任命JD-万斯（JD Vance）为他的竞选搭档，将这位由风险投资家转行而来的参议员推上了共和党总统候选人的宝座，他所拥护的民粹主义政治赢得了全国的关注，并使他成为共和党内一颗冉冉升起的新星。摄影师：Hannah Beier/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Representative Matt Gaetz, a Republican from Florida, during the Republican National Convention (RNC) at the Fiserv Forum in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, US, on Tuesday, July 16, 2024. Former President Donald Trump tapped JD Vance as his running mate, elevating to the Republican presidential ticket a venture capitalist-turned-senator whose embrace of populist politics garnered national attention and made him a rising star in the party. Photographer: Hannah Beier/Bloomberg】
